snippet: David Beckham earned $26 million from personal sponsorship deals in his final full year as a player, an increase of 10 percent, his company’s accounts show.
abstract: David Beckham earned $26 million from personal sponsorship deals in his final full year as a player; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: David Beckham earned $26 million from personal sponsorship deals in his final full year as a player, an increase of 10 percent, his company’s accounts show.
